byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Opposes U S-Brit union, radio s
snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 1--"In my opinion, if Britain goes down we are next on Hitler's list," Major Gen. John F. O'Ryan, wartime commander of New York's Twentyseventh Division, said tonight....

headline.main: SAYS WE ARE NEXT ON 'HITLER'S LIST'; Gen. O'Ryan, on Radio Forum, Supports Union Now With Britain for Defense HE WARNS ON OCEAN RULE J.B. Trevor Holds Joint Action Would Revive Hatreds and Rend the Country

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 1--"In my opinion, if Britain goes down we are next on Hitler's list," Major Gen. John F. O'Ryan, wartime commander of New York's Twentyseventh Division, said tonight.
